com.irurueta.geometry.estimators.PointCorrespondenceAffineTransformation3DRobustEstimator

Packages that use PointCorrespondenceAffineTransformation3DRobustEstimator
Package
Description
com.irurueta.geometry.estimators
This package contains classes to estimate basic geometric structures

  • Uses of PointCorrespondenceAffineTransformation3DRobustEstimator in com.irurueta.geometry.estimators

    Subclasses of PointCorrespondenceAffineTransformation3DRobustEstimator in com.irurueta.geometry.estimators
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    LMedSPointCorrespondenceAffineTransformation3DRobustEstimator
    Finds the best affine 3D transformation for provided collections of matched 3D points using LMedS algorithm.
    class 
    MSACPointCorrespondenceAffineTransformation3DRobustEstimator
    Finds the best affine 3D transformation for provided collections of matched 3D points using MSAC algorithm.
    class 
    PROMedSPointCorrespondenceAffineTransformation3DRobustEstimator
    Finds the best affine 3D transformation for provided collections of matched 3D points using PROSAC algorithm.
    class 
    PROSACPointCorrespondenceAffineTransformation3DRobustEstimator
    Finds the best affine 3D transformation for provided collections of matched 3D points using PROSAC algorithm.
    class 
    RANSACPointCorrespondenceAffineTransformation3DRobustEstimator
    Finds the best affine 3D transformation for provided collection of matched 3D points using RANSAC algorithm.
